data.text: The show had a tendency to build really well to a big moment (Hannah quits Iowa, comes back and is dumped by Adam) and then undermine it entirely (Hannah goes back to writing even though she is not good or driven, Adam tries to get back with Hannah for...why).
For the record, I wasn't hate-watching. I liked a lot of things about Girls and the rest were so bad or problematic I was always threatening to quit. One of the most uneven shows I've ever watched.
